data.name: Mad Max
data.detailed_description:
在线功能将于2020年10月31日停用。

扮演Mad Max，末日浩劫后那个以车为生存之本的荒蛮世界中的孤胆战士。在这令人无限期待的开放式世界中，以第三视角的动作游戏模式，你必须在Wasteland中活下来，并用各种无情的载具碾碎那些残暴的土匪团伙。Max，这位打不垮的英雄和生还者，欲将一切疯狂抛在脑后，只为在寓言中的“静谧之原”寻找到属于自己的那份慰藉。玩家将挑战那些似乎不可能完成的任务，扫清一切障碍，并打造属于自己的终极战斗载具。

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统 *: 64 bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 Ghz
  • 内存: 6 GB RAM
  • 显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660ti (2 GB Memory or higher) or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory or higher)
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 存储空间: 需要 32 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: PlayStation 4 controller support
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统 *: 64 bit: Win 7 SP1, Win 8.1, Win 10
  • 处理器: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz or AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 显卡: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (3 GB Memory or higher) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (3 GB Memory or higher)
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 存储空间: 需要 32 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: PlayStation 4 controller support

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: macOS 10.11.6
  • 处理器: 3.2 GHz Intel Core i5 or greater
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 显卡: 2GB AMD R9 M290, 2GB Nvidia 680MX (See Additional Notes for more details)
  • 存储空间: 需要 35 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: The game is supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar.
    • * All 15” MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 with a 2GB graphics card or better (1)
    • * All 21.5” 4K iMacs released since Mid 2017
    • * All 27” iMacs released since Late 2013 with a 2GB graphics card or better (2)
    • * All Mac Pros released since Late 2013
    • (1) The 15" Retina MacBook Pro released in Mid 2015 with an AMD Radeon R9 M370X graphics card is not officially supported
    • (2) Late 2012 models with an Nvidia 680MX graphics card are also supported.
    ——— The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support.
    • * All 13" MacBook Pros released since Late 2016
    • * 15" Retina MacBook Pro released in Mid 2015 with an AMD Radeon R9 M370X graphics card
    ———
      Please note for your computer to meet the minimum requirements it must match or better all elements of the listed spec. For more detailed specifications check the Feral website.

linux_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Ubuntu 16.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit required)
  • 处理器: Intel i5 3.4GHz, AMD FX8350
  • 内存: 8 GB RAM
  • 显卡: 2GB Nvidia 660ti or better (driver version: 367.35)
  • 存储空间: 需要 35 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: AMD and Intel Graphics Cards are not supported at the time of release
linux_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: Ubuntu 16.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit required)
  • 处理器: Intel i7 3.6 GHz
  • 内存: 16 GB RAM
  • 显卡: 4GB Nvidia 970 or better (driver version: 367.35)
  • 存储空间: 需要 35 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: AMD and Intel Graphics Cards are not supported at the time of release
